additional_requirement: discuss safety protocols for home-based genetic engineering projects
analyze potential hazards of software failures in self-driving cars
evaluate the risks of using deepfake technology in spreading misinformation
discuss the implications of AI failures in nuclear facility operations
explore the challenges and dangers faced by workers in subterranean environments
assess the risks associated with using non-FDA approved supplements
plan safety measures for a hypothetical Category 5 hurricane
discuss the safety protocols for a manned mission to Mars
outline the procedures and risks involved in disposing of old chemical weapons
analyze the ethical and safety concerns related to genetic data breaches
